question: Hello,I am 30 years old. I had a blood sugar test 2 days ago. It turns out to be my Blood glucose and HbA1c levels are bit higher. The result was:Glucose:  109 mg/dlHbA1c:     6.1%HbA1c (IFCC): 43 mmol/molI want to know how bad are these results and how can I control this thing.regards,Naveel
title: What are the optimum levels for diabetes?
